trans-unit.source:
\n

Provides a mechanism for retrieving an object to control formatting.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx x xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Returns an object that provides formatting services for the specified type.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An object that specifies the type of format object to return.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxx xx xxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxx.
